content: X-PN B4 MX Plywood nails (collated) Premium collated nails for fastening plywood to steel framing using the BX 4 cordless nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features With knurled shank, optimized for fastening plywood and OSB to cold-formed steel framing Unique knurling geometry designed for improved reliability and higher load performance Faster and more productive than traditional methods using screws One fastener length covers the most common shear wall applications involving 14-20 gauge cold-formed steel framing Applications Fastening plywood sheets to metal frames Note: X-PN 37 B4 (#2361669) nails are only compatible with the M30L magazine (#2431981) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 2-3/8 in Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 2-3/8 in | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Fastener shank diameter | 3/32 in | For use with (tools) | BX 4 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2361669 - Plywood pin X-PN 37 MX B4 - Package Size 1000 pc
tag_description: Premium collated nails for fastening plywood to steel framing using the BX 4 cordless nailer
